availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Hannover, Germany. Married to Frederica Stratman. Immigrated to the United States on May 10, 1855. Resident of Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Henderson Ward 1, p. 99A.
Passenger Lists of Vessels Arriving at New York, New York, 1820-1897, Microfilm Publication M237, Records of the U.S. Customs Service, NARA RG36, Washington, D.C.
"Henry Stratman (1836-1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial 85986930, accessed January 11, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/85986930/henry-stratman.
